# mkdocs-exclude-notused

A simple MkDocs plugin that automatically removes all .md files not included in the nav section of your mkdocs.yaml file.

## How to use

Simply add plugin to your mkdocs .yml file

```
plugins:
  - mkdocs-exclude-notused
```
